A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The movie is a slap in the face to fans.

No explanations\, huge gaps in the plot\, the casino planet oh wow... dull boring. Bad humor...after people have been killed ( BB8s beeping after 1 scene) ... Leia is now more powerful than any sith or jedi that has ever lived... with no force training.

There is a ton of social adgenda messages in this movie. Men ...more or less are stupid\, evil or ..in the way.  The casino planet... the implied message is all rich people are bad and evil\, for not give all the money they make to other people.

Luke Skywlaker.... oh wow..... it is a disgrace.

I could go on and on\, and in my FB I have.

Honestly\, I can not say how much of a disapointment this was.  For me\, it has ruined the legacy.  I never expected to see this kind of crap from a star wars movie.
